categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Copper" was the nickname of a protocol droid owned by the Galactic Empire. As an experiment, Imperial technicians equipped the droid with deflector shield generators to provide defense for ground troops. However, the project was abandoned, and Copper was recruited by a young smuggler.

Copper first appeared in Star Wars: Uprising, a 2015 mobile game released by Kabam for iOS and Android platforms. In Uprising, Copper is a Unique Crew Member who can be assigned on Crew Runs to collect helpful items.
